FuncDef: This command specifies an upper limit to the number of discovered peers permitted within the routing instance. This can be used to ensure that a routing instance does not consume all the possible discovered peers and blocking discovered peers in other routing instances.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the maximum number of discovered peers allowed in the routing instance. Values-0 to 50. ParamDefault: Default- 0 (The maximum number of discovered peers supported by the system).
